1: <pb/><e>Bit yet David chi bitnelay yet chi ajtok eb israel bay Jerusalén.</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, man luesok wanimail, cax c'am chin bey yin mimanbail; c'am chin toj yintak tzet yetal ya' nachaj elok, tol c'am chi je' in lajlen in ba yetok.</t>
2: <t>A ti' wet, tz'inc'al quin chi, tok ay tzet chin na'. Axca wal nene' max xew txutxwi, cax chelbil aj yuj is txutx, caytu' wayji.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Ex wet conob, jaek oc Jehová yipok co c'ul tinani', c'al yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
